import { CardGrid, LinkCard } from "@astrojs/starlight/components"
import { capitalizeUtil } from "@fefade/core/utils"
import { Button } from "@fefade/svelte"

<CardGrid>
	{["svelte"].map((framework) => (
		<LinkCard
			title={capitalizeUtil(framework)}
			href={`/templates/${framework}`}
		/>
	))}
	{["react", "vue"].map((framework) => (
		<LinkCard
			title={`${capitalizeUtil(framework)} (?)`}
			href={"/templates/"}
			style={{ pointerEvents: "none" }}
		/>
	))}
</CardGrid>
